imdb.plot outline: A dramedy about two best friends, Evie, an industrious Bisexual, and Ben, a PhD Queer Studies Professor, who cross the lines of sexual fluidity and commitment, searching for the key to unlock their stale relationships.
imdb.title: Stale Mate
plot: Two best friends, Evie, an industrious Bisexual, and Ben, a PhD Queer Studies Professor, cross the lines of sexual fluiditiy and commitment, unlocking their stale relationships.

A dramedy about two best friends, Evie, an industrious Bisexual, and Ben, a PhD Queer Studies Professor, who cross the lines of sexual fluidity and commitment, searching for the key to unlock their stale relationships.
